vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.2; married to Elimelech (H0458);
mother of: Mahlon (H4248) and Chilion (H3630); also called Mara at Rut.1.20;
Also named: ma.ra (מָרָא "Mara" H4755)
§ Naomi = "my delight"
wife of Elimelech, mother of Mahlon and Chilion, and mother-in-law of Ruth and Orpah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿俄米 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "我的喜悅"
以利米勒的妻子, 瑪倫和基連的母親,以及路得和俄珥巴的婆婆
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿俄米 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "我的喜悦"
以利米勒的妻子, 玛伦和基连的母亲,以及路得和俄珥巴的婆婆
